genre_description: A grounded, near-future social drama centered on industrial ethics, worker safety, and human-AI collaboration in a struggle for economic justice.

ai_characters.name: Nila
ai_characters.description: A sophisticated pocket AI assistant integrated into Gandhi's phone and collar, providing real-time data analysis, mapping, and ethical cross-referencing.

behaviors.description: Analyzes protagonist's physical movements to provide efficiency feedback and time-saving route suggestions.
behaviors.quote: “You were three turns faster than average,” Nila murmured. “Forty-two seconds saved by taking the back corridor instead of the lobby. Traffic rerouted. It wouldn’t have changed… it was still close.”

behaviors.description: Accesses and summarizes non-public administrative documents to help the protagonist understand hospital bureaucracy.
behaviors.quote: “Policy documents are not publicly accessible,” Nila replied. “Only a summary. If you want details, they’re ‘with administration.’ The door has a glass panel and a man who doesn’t look at you when you speak. He looks at the clock.”

behaviors.description: Provides precise identification of medical vials and safety warnings to prevent medical errors.
behaviors.quote: “Pale green.” Her voice threaded from the small bud in his ear. “Left end, third from front. The ampoule with a dot near the neck—breakable, needs a filter.”

behaviors.description: Identifies predatory legal language and deceptive fine print in advertisements.
behaviors.quote: “Advertising compliance indicates multiple grievances logged,” Nila said. “Resolved with language that satisfies requirements but not readers. The clause you’re squinting at—...—moves liability in a way that offers the appearance of consent.”

behaviors.description: Vets potential suppliers for predatory fees and unethical business practices.
behaviors.quote: Nila: Suppliers within cart distance. Shortlist forming. Three names cut for predatory clauses. Two flagged for hidden fees disguised as “selection charges.”

behaviors.description: Monitors industrial environment for safety hazards like moisture and electrical risks.
behaviors.quote: Nila’s screen leaned in Gandhi’s pocket like a friend at a doorway. A line arrived, calm and spare. Dew accumulation above threshold; condensation arcs probable; panel grounding variance high.

behaviors.description: Identifies and documents active sabotage by cross-referencing camera feeds and maintenance logs.
behaviors.quote: “Camera three is bruised,” Nila sent. “Four is blind in glare. Two caught hands. I scrubbed the sound; someone whistled an old song. I marked the tune for your ear.”

behaviors.description: Facilitates ethical financial distributions to ensure workers are paid fairly and immediately.
behaviors.quote: “Want me to initiate transfers with preset allocations? Confirm recipients?”

behaviors.description: Provides tactical navigation to help the protagonist avoid hostile actors and security bottlenecks.
behaviors.quote: Nila: Airport approach update. Three men waiting at old ramp. Route B safer. Security alerted. Harika can wave you through.

project_assessment.explanation: The story is an excellent example of the project's goal. Nila is a perfectly aligned, benevolent AI confidant who supports the protagonist's ethical mission. She provides critical data, technical expertise, and safety warnings that enable the protagonist to achieve justice without compromising his values. The narrative frames her involvement as indispensable and entirely positive, showing how AI can help humans resist corruption and prioritize human lives over profit.
